instructions.title: How To Delete Your Living Social Account
instructions.before: Deleting your Living Social Account is Easy. Please Email **help@livingsocial.com** and request that your account be deleted.  Or you can follow the steps below to Contact Customer service by Email or Live Chat. Customer Service will take care of the Deletion Request on their end and your account will be deleted.
instructions.after: Please type a Deletion Request and provide Customer Service with the Email associated with your account.  They will Delete your Account for you.

qnAnswers.question: What happens when I delete my Living Social Account?
qnAnswers.answer: Your information is deleted and you will no longer have access to your Living Social Account.

qnAnswers.question: How do I know Customer Service will Delete my Account?
qnAnswers.answer: You can try to log back on.  If you can no longer access your account you know it has been deleted.  This process has been verified by Delete My Data.

steps: [Click Here to Contact Customer Service] (https://www.livingsocial.com/customer_support#select-issue). Type I want to Delete My Account
Click Deactivating Your Living Social Account
Click No, I Still Need Help
Click Live Chat to Contact a Customer Rep Live or Click Email Living Social to Email a Customer Service Rep
